name: Staatliches
description: Staatliches is a clean cut display face with charmingly unconventional proportions. The alphabet was designed in response to Herbert Bayerâ€™s title lettering on the cover of the first Bauhaus exhibition catalogue , which was published in 1923. It features full sets of capitals, numbers, punctuation, and symbols, in addition to alternate widths, discretionary ligatures, and common Latin accents.
author: Brian LaRossa, Erica Carras
